column2: U.S. Supreme Court rejects Google patent appeal over Street View WASHINGTON
column3: June 22 Google Inc will have to defend claims that its Street View mapping software violates patents held by Vederi LLC after the U.S. Supreme Court on Monday declined to take up the company's appeal.
